(C) Water levels: Low water levels up to start of spawning season. High water levels during spawning period.
(H) recommended enhancement: Chinook enhancement by Robertson Creek staff. The last 2 years have had very disappointing adult returns.
(K) Additional comments: This system was monitored by Robertson Creek hatchery staff, Ross Hickling on behalf of the Ucluelet Indian Band, and Fishery Officer staff (helicopter).
